metadata.title: CVE-2024-26994 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:speakup: Avoid crash on very long wordIn case a console is set up really large and contains a really long word(> 256 characters), we have to stop before the length of the word buffer.
